name: Global Research Conference on Neurology and Brain Disorders
content: We the Foster Research Organization are inaugurating a Global Research Conference on Neurology and Brain Disorders at Barcelona, Spain slated on the dates 21-23 October, 2024 with the agenda "Investigating the Uncertain Domains in Neurological Research and Raising the Potential Treatments for Brain Disorders". The conference aims to bring together distinguished scientists, researchers, academicians, notable neurologist, healthcare professionals, surgeons, nurses, caregivers, pharmacists, industry icons and government representatives to discuss the latest innovations, trends, and problems in the field. The Expert Organizing Committee of the conference will be composed of a group of senior and highly esteemed scientists and researchers who will review the abstracts and participant profiles to ensure the conference's exceptional quality.
